name: redux-saga-sc
description: Provides sagas to easily dispatch redux actions over SocketCluster websockets

scripts.coverage: npm run coveralls && npm run codeclimate
scripts.coveralls: node_modules/.bin/babel-node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec --recursive test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Stian Didriksen <stipsan@gmail.com>
